pullrequest.title: Fix HIDPI issue with GLWidget window size.

content.raw: I will try to test on Yakkety (perhaps in Docker) and if it is fixed there then I wouldn't bother patching it.  Unfortunately I don't know if I can get that done by tomorrow.  Or maybe I can just install the latest version of Ogre and give that a try.  I'll check your homebrew bottle.  At the worst case perhaps you can stick a patch it the Debian packages specifically for Xenial etc.
